body:
The test has failed several times in CI due to a timeout: 
https://dev.azure.com/cncf/envoy/_build/results?buildId=18375
https://dev.azure.com/cncf/envoy/_build/results?buildId=18300

Based on the first output the issue seems to be in `IpVersions/RedisClusterWithAuthIntegrationTest.SingleSlotMasterReplica/IPv4`:
```
==================== Test output for //test/extensions/clusters/redis:redis_cluster_integration_test:
[==========] Running 8 tests from 2 test suites.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 6 tests from IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.SingleSlotMasterReplica/IPv4
[       OK ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.SingleSlotMasterReplica/IPv4 (346 ms)
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.SingleSlotMasterReplica/IPv6
[       OK ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.SingleSlotMasterReplica/IPv6 (273 ms)
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.TwoSlot/IPv4
[       OK ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.TwoSlot/IPv4 (272 ms)
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.TwoSlot/IPv6
[       OK ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.TwoSlot/IPv6 (288 ms)
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.ClusterSlotRequestAfterRedirection/IPv4
[       OK ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.ClusterSlotRequestAfterRedirection/IPv4 (272 ms)
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.ClusterSlotRequestAfterRedirection/IPv6
[       OK ] IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest.ClusterSlotRequestAfterRedirection/IPv6 (268 ms)
[----------] 6 tests from IpVersions/RedisClusterIntegrationTest (1719 ms total)

[----------] 2 tests from IpVersions/RedisClusterWithAuthIntegrationTest
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/RedisClusterWithAuthIntegrationTest.SingleSlotMasterReplica/IPv4
================================================================================

TIMEOUT: //test/extensions/clusters/redis:redis_cluster_integration_test (Summary)
```

but other runs don't output anything, so there might be something else going on. Running this locally with `bazel test //test/extensions/clusters/redis:redis_cluster_integration_test --nocache_test_results --runs_per_test=10000 --local_resources=1000,1000,1000 --jobs 80` didn't reproduce any timeout, although running just the SingleSlotMasterReplica resulted in 2 failures out of 1000  runs:

```
Note: Google Test filter = IpVersions/RedisClusterWithAuthIntegrationTest.SingleSlotMasterReplica/IPv4
[==========] Running 1 test from 1 test suite.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 1 test from IpVersions/RedisClusterWithAuthIntegrationTest
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/RedisClusterWithAuthIntegrationTest.SingleSlotMasterReplica/IPv4
test/extensions/clusters/redis/redis_cluster_integration_test.cc:222: Failure
Value of: fake_upstreams_[stream_index]->waitForRawConnection(fake_upstream_connection_)
  Actual: false (Timed out waiting for raw connection)
Expected: true
```
which might be related.

@HenryYYang Are you able to take a look at this?
title: Test flake in //test/extensions/clusters/redis:redis_cluster_integration_test
